message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it exceeds all expectations. We believe its value surpasses $8000, but I understand that each individual might perceive its worth differently. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering this opportunity to acquire it for an exclusive price of $12000. This is a special offer tailored to discerning buyers like yourself, who appreciate the finer things. If you're interested in exploring this further, please let me know. Thank you for considering our product.
